attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Big companies make mistakes and can be reluctant to rectify them, often sending threatening letters and involving debt collectors when all that is required is a moments thought and acknowledgement of a mistake. Often only a letter to a paper or TV program gets this sort of thing resolved, and if you aren't one of the lucky few these disputes can drag on for months or even years.

This corporate incompetence and apathy causes a great deal of distress and upset, as much as noise or environmental pollution, and the companies that cause it should be made accountable for their actions with statuatory fines of a magnitude designed to encourage them to treat customers with the respect they deserve.
